item.description:
Irene is coming in and she can't stop us!!!!!

We are heading down to Pickering Wharf to check out the waves, have some dinner then go have some fun at Metro Bowl with some Glow Bowling.

 

Where: Meet in front of Victoria's station

Time: 4:00pm walk around checking out the waves

5:00pm Dinner at Vic's Station

Post dinner: Bowling at Metro Bowl in Peabody (63 Foster St)

 

What to bring: Your camera, your laughter and the Meetup Cell Phone (978-304-2811) in case you get lost, can't find us or decide at the last minute not to come along.

 

Disclaimer: This event could get cancelled depending on Irene's level of fury, so please check out the MU site prior to leaving for the event. We will attempt to post updates no later than 3pm on Saturday.

 

Hope to see you there

Donna & Janet
item.name: Waves, Food & Fun
